00012 import java.beans.*;
00013 
00018 public abstract class AbstractModel {
00019 
00020     protected PropertyChangeSupport propertyChangeSupport;
00021 
00022     public AbstractModel()
00023     {
00024         propertyChangeSupport = new PropertyChangeSupport(this);
00025     }
00026

00028         propertyChangeSupport.addPropertyChangeListener(listener);
00029     }
00030

00032         propertyChangeSupport.removePropertyChangeListener(listener);
00033     }
00034
